divs: Sighting Detailsat 12:55 i was driving home on hwy 377 going north i seen a bright light in the sky going so slow it did not look like it was moving the closer i got to it the better i could see it when i got even with it me going north and it going west all i could see was this big black triangle with lights all over it a lot of blues and whites the blue lights seem to be bigger than the white ones i pulled over and got out to get a better look i could tell it was no plane and was bigger than a dc10 i have ever seen anything like this in my life i dont know how it stayed in the sky as slow as it was moving i could not hear it make a sound i ran back to the car to get my cell phone to take a pic when i turned back around from the car it was gone
Summary: Seen a black triangle shape covered in so many lights I could not count them.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Aubrey
There were no other sightings in Aubrey on or around February 17th 2010
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
